system.description:
Your connection to the elements deepens now during your turn you can spend 5 Rage and 1 AP to can gain an additional elemental effect that is active during the duration of your Rage. However Fire and Water cannot be active at the same time as well as Earth and Air. Additionally the effect of each Element is getting stronger:

  • Fire: The Aura increases to 4.5m and each time the Barbarian hits a creature with a MEELE MARTIAL ATTACK they recieve [BURNING I] for 2 turns.

  • Earth: The Aura increases to 4.5m and each time they hit a creature with a MEELE MARTIAL ATTACK and that attack is higher than the creatures TOUGHNESS they are [STUNNED I] for 1 turn.

  • Water: The Aura increases to 4.5m and each time they hit a creature with a MEELE MARTIAL ATTACK and that attack is higher than the creatures STABILITY they are [RESTRAINED I] by ice for 1 turn.

  • Air: The Aura increases to 4.5m and each time they hit a creature with a MEELE MARTIAL ATTACK a target of their choice within the area effect is hit by a lightning strike for lightning damage equal 1d6 + Rage.
